metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20552 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Tcpreplay before 4.3.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read in packet2tree intree.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.2.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.2.6-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
